PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2008-19532008-12-19HERITAGE,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisAppointment of PETER DOMINIC CHARBONNEAU of Ottawa, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Broadcasting Corporation to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, in the place of Hélène F. Fortin, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
